practice_phrases.target: are you going to answer me?

practice_phrases.known: 我想很快回答，但我不知道
practice_phrases.target: I want to answer soon, but I do not know

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我不能轻松回答，因为我正在努力学习
practice_phrases.target: I guess I can not answer easily, because I am trying to learn

practice_phrases.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答，因为我想说得很好
practice_phrases.target: I do not like taking too much time to answer, because I want to say it well
